text: Va ʙa moli jatim nazdik nasaved, magar ʙa ʙehtarin sakl [ki ʙa sudu salohi u ʙosad], to ʙa sinni [ʙuluƣ va] rusdi xud ʙirasad va [sancisi] pajmona va tarozuro ʙa adolat komil kuned.Mo hec kasero cuz ʙa andozai tavonas mukallaf namesozem va hangome ki suxan megued [jo guvohi medihed], pas, adolatro rioja kuned, harcand, [dar ʙorai] xesovand ʙosad va ʙa ahdu pajmoni Alloh taolo vafo kuned. In ast [on ci Alloh taolo] sumoro ʙa [pajravi az] on suporis kardaast, ʙosad, ki pand gired
